title: Another Year, Another Set of Switch-Outs: EF Education-EasyPost, Intermarché-Wanty Reveal Special Giro d’Italia Kits
content:
EF Education-EasyPost pays homage to Italian carbs with reworked 'Pizza, Pasta' phrases in latest Rapha collaboration.

Read the full article at Another Year, Another Set of Switch-Outs: EF Education-EasyPost, Intermarché-Wanty Reveal Special Giro d’Italia Kits on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
